text: William Wyndham Grenville, 1st Baron Grenville PC (25 October 1759â€“12 January 1834), was a British Whig statesman and Prime Minister. Grenville was the son of Prime Minister George Grenville. He was educated at Eton College, Christ Church, Oxford and Lincoln's Inn. == References == Category:1759 births Category:1834 deaths Category:Alumni of the University of Oxford Category:British Barons Category:People educated at Eton College Category:Politicians from Buckinghamshire
title: William Wyndham Grenville, 1st Baron Grenville
